name: ARCHITECT (itch)
description:
ARCHITECT was made for the GMTK game jam, Sep. 2018, for the theme GENRE without MECHANIC: This is a building game without solid ground.

THE GAME DOESN'T WORK! I forgot to include the UnityPlayer.dll . You can download it HERE to make the game work, hopefully.

You're very excited to start working at ARCHITECT inc. as a new construction worker, but when you arrive at the site you notice that something is wrong.

Gather resources from the building in order to make it as high as possible, while it disintegrates beneath you. (Note: The higher you build, the less resources you get to build more floors).

Controls:

* Left mouse button for choosing a building part and placing it

* Middle mouse button/Up and down arrows to move up and down the building

* Space to skip a turn (useful for resource gathering)

Have fun!
